channel.title: Thanks Stuart!
channel.description:
I just learned Radixtalk is shutting down. Sorry to hear that, though I can understand it doesn't make much sense for you to keep it alive.
Just wanted to say thanks for all the effort you have been putting into getting momentum going and providing such resources for the community.
